name: Plane Sim
description:
Terrible, don't download.

There's no way to exit so you have to alt tab and click the X on your taskbar.. Unless you're smart and have it in windowed mode.

Also I don't know if it works for Mac or linux.

Made for a 24 hour jam but I only used the last 3 hours effectively as I at first wanted to make a KSP ripoff.

I couldn't figure out how to attatch parts to one another.. So you have this.
